description.title: description
description.value: Whenever I smell strong tobacco smoke when I'm in an enclosed space such as a room, train, or aircraft, I begin to get angry. There are several reasons. First, medical researchers have shown that secondhand smoke, that is, the smoke from other people's cigarettes, causes cancer and other health problems. If the smoke were car exhaust or burning trash, we would put out the fire and open the windows to get rid of the smoke. Second, it stinks. The smoke drifts away from the smoker and fills the room.

Rejuv Spreader.name: Vision of Unending Growth
Rejuv Spreader.desc: Rejuvenation has a 2% chance to create a new Rejuvenation on a nearby target on tick.

The Dark Titans Lesson.name: The Dark Titans Lesson
The Dark Titans Lesson.desc: You may apply Lifebloom to two targets at once, and Lifeblooms 'bloom' healing is increased by 75%.

Swiftmend Extension.name: Verdant Infusion
Swiftmend Extension.desc: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of HoTs on the target by 10s

Free Wild Growth.name: Lycara's Fleeting Glimpse
Free Wild Growth.desc: Every 45s while in combat, cast a spell based on your form (Wild Growth, Primal Wrath, Starfall, Stampeding Roar)
